original_title: Celtic Woman: The Greatest Journey - Essential Collection
overview: Celtic Woman’s ‘The Greatest Journey Essential Collection.’ DVD was released in 2008 and features all the tracks most associated with Celtic Woman. This is a definitive collection of the best of Celtic Woman up to the time of release and includes ‘Harry’s Game’, ‘Danny Boy’ and many other favourites.
tagline: Celtic Woman: The Greatest Journey - Essential Collection
title: Celtic Woman: The Greatest Journey - Essential Collection
